alert.note: Alert for Washington (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 8:34AM CDT until May 27 at 1:24AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Caney River near Ramona affecting Washington OK County. Caney River near Collinsville affecting Tulsa and Rogers Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Caney River near Ramona. * WHEN...From this evening to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, moderate agricultural flooding occurs from Ochelata to the northeastern tip of Tulsa County. Some rural roads are impassable including the road between Ramona and Talala. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 15.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 27.8 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
